of class name

Bases: object

Self-Service Semantic Suite (S4) Text-Annotation Api

process(output_type, **kwargs)¶

Processes JSON notation

Args: output_type - ‘json’ or ‘xml’. The output format of the results.

Kwargs: body - Dictionary. Data, passed with request body

process_multipart_request(data, **kwargs)¶

Processes multipart and/or mixed data. / Returns: XML structure

Args: service - Text processing service (twitie, news or sbt)

data - Dictionary with binary file contents and metadata
